original_text: And the publican, standing afar off, would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven, but smote upon his breast, saying, God be merciful to me a sinner.
korean_text: 세리는 멀리 서서 감히 눈을 들어 하늘을 쳐다보지도 못하고 다만 가슴을 치며 이르되 하나님이여 불쌍히 여기소서 나는 죄인이로소이다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: And the publican, standing afar off
would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven
saying, God be merciful to me a sinner
sentences.korean_translation: 말하길, 하나님이여 나 죄인에게 자비를 베푸소서
